programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep28
programme.desc: Don'T Worry Be Peppy / Two'S A Cloud - When Poppy worries that her father doesn’t feel useful now that’s he’s no longer King, she asks her friends to bring Peppy small problems to solve. But will Peppy be able to face a real threat, in the form of a swamp monster?/When Cloud Guy moves into Branch’s bunker, Branch will do whatever it takes to get his unwanted roommate to leave- including inviting his annoying cloud parents over.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep13
programme.desc: Mr. Ladybug'S Secret/Wetyard - When Rabbit blackmails Mr. Ladybug into doing one last job for him, Berry wants in on the action. / The backyard gets flooded, so Rocksy forms a crew out of the Mighty Ones and search for dry land.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Trashy Tale Of The Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'D - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly'S Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa'S Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part Ii - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants’ brain and defeat the nanobots’ leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Worrisome Wedge Of The Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep5
programme.desc: Big Man On Berk - Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized – and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang In There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful Of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison In The Pit Of The Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep31
programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep31
programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky And The Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land…. But only in exchange for one thing…. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest… who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep725
programme.desc: Pups Save The Whale Pod - When Wingnut's junk pile and Oscar go missing at the same time, Chase and team are called in to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Dinobot/Forest Squad in Space - Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Hiccup Soup - Santi and crew get magically transported to the past, where they team up with young Abuelo to get back to the present! // When faced with a case of magical hiccups, Santi and his crew must collect ingredients to make the cure-all Hiccup Soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra’s house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Sorry Not Sorry - Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Paddington Meets Lucky / Paddington and the Love Day Cards - Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens! // Paddington is on a mission to deliver Love Day cards to all his friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep619

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.desc: The Legend of Capitán Calavera - When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitán Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315

programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step - Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparent's marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Pam & Jelly / Inside Angus - After Jelly goes missing, Parker and Lily volunteer to help Ms. Pam find her. // After accidentally swallowing an irreplaceable Shackleton family stamp, Parker goes inside Angus to retrieve it.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep118
programme.desc: For Good Treasure / A Clean Breakout - The boys' class is at the beach, training to be junior life-guards. When suddenly they find a treasure map...// The Guptas are having a yard sale! In all the confusion Sammy's phone accidentally ends up in the donation pile!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Getting Heated - There's a heatwave and Sammy and Raj are over it. Luckily Sammy remembers he has two VIP passes to The Polar Palace!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Puzzled - When Theodore drops a puzzle piece down a floor vent, he gets trapped inside while trying to fish it out.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Car Wars - When the Chipmunks get stuck in traffic en route to a show, tempers flare between themselves and other drivers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep229
programme.desc: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass - SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mother's basement.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Shell Game/Blossom Goes Wild! - Gargamel turns himself into a snail so Farmer will bring him back to the Smurfs' Village. // When Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, she leaves her village and moves into the forest with Wild

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market / Copy Can't - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori. // When Ronnie Anne notices that she's the only person Carlitos won't copy, she's determined to change it!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Perro Malo - Our sweet Lalo get switched with mischievous perrito Malo for the day and the Casagrandes need to get their pup back!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Fashion No Show - Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Diss the Cook / For Sale by Loner - Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters. // Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Fright Bite / The Loudly Bones - When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires. // Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? / The Kwarantined Krab - SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Nitwit Neighborhood News / The Patrick Show MidSeason Finale - Patrick and Squidina report the news around Bikini Bottom. // The Patrick Show presents the epic conclusion to the first half of its first season.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep261
programme.desc: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague - SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep66
programme.desc: Dunces and Dragons - After a freak jousting accident at a Medieval Times restaurant, SpongeBob and Patrick are transported to a medieval version of Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep65
programme.desc: Selling Out / Funny Pants - Mr. Krabs sells the Krusty Krab to a conglomerate and explores the joys of retirement. // Squidward tricks his neighbor into believing that Spongebob has a laugh-related illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep64
programme.desc: Good Neighbors / Skill Crane - Squidward's lazy Sunday is constantly interrupted by Spongebob and Patrick's Good Neighbor Club activities. // Squidward becomes obsessed with winning a prize from the Skill Crane.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S04 Ep61
programme.desc: Fear of a Krabby Patty / Shell of a Man - With the Krusty Krab's new "open 24 hours" policy, the employees must work 'round the clock. // Mr. Krabs loses his shell right before a big reunion with his old buddies.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep104
programme.desc: I Named It Whiskers / How Angus Got His Groove Back - After one of Lily's inventions goes haywire, she enlists Parker's help to get it back under control. // Angus loses his lucky beanie, which causes him to revert back to being a child.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Inside Russell - Parker must save Angus from rapidly aging inside Russell's belly.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 1 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 2 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Waterbending Master - The kids reach the Northern Water tribe, and Aang and Katara look for a Waterbending Master as Sokka falls for a princess. Meanwhile, Zhao plans an attack and Zuko must find a way to continue his quest for the Avatar.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Private and the Winky Factory - Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep302
programme.desc: A Kipper for Skipper / High Moltage - It’s off to the races when Skipper agrees to give a day off from hard training to the first penguin who can bring him a kipper. // The penguins are determined to make opening day of their favorite action star’s blockbuster movie!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Operation: Big Blue Marble - The Penguins are faced with a global battle when their specialty food-making machine belches out a toxic cloud that threatens not just the zoo, not just the city, but the earth itself!

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Love Loaf / Beach Day... of Horror - SwaySway and Buhdeuce sneak into a "girls only" summer camp in order to find the one and only Jenny Quackles. // The guys head to the beach and nothing is gonna ruin their day, not even a big scary M-M-M-M-MONSTER

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Cleo for Class President / The Janitor - When Cleo runs for class president, Ollie summons Courtney Poweredge from the pack to be her campaign manager. // Nobody but Ollie suspects that the new school janitor is a monster.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Shell in a Cell / Minotaur Maze - Leo unseats Raph's idol as pro wrestling champion of the world. // Beat the mutant maze in 30 minutes or less and the pizza is free.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Maximum Denis / Dog Wave - The boys go undercover to defend their video game dominance at the Frycade. // Sanjay and Craig decide to get a dog but end up with 100 dogs.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Dorg's New Mom / Dorg Hates Olives - The gang need an adult escort to see the new Johnny Fist movie, so Yooki possesses Dorg's mom. // Dorg needs the Magicals' help to stomach his mom's icky Olive Surprise recipe. But instead, they accidentally turn the town into olive-loving zombies!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chimp Chomp Chumps / Precious Pig - Fanboy and Chum Chum are happily waiting in line for movie tickets when Boog arrives and ruins everything. // Fanboy is devastated when he is stripped of his class pet privileges.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Cruisin' for a Bruisin' / Puppy Love - To distract Dudley from bothering her on T.U.F.F.’s vacation cruise, Kitty lies and tells him that they’re on a stakeout. // Dudley gets a crush for the new temp at T.U.F.F., Fifi Oui Oui - but "she" has a surprise.

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Battle for the Infinite Ocean - The time has come to bring Tritannus and Icy down. An epic battle ensues with all of the planets' forces uniting as one. Bloom and the Winx must stop Tritannus before he activates the Emperor's throne. But will it be too late?

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep526
programme.desc: The End of Tritannus - Tritannus has his cousin, Aisha, in his clutches. She is a critical part of his plan for dimension domination. Could evil possibly prevail?

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Bumblebee Magnetic Karaoke Hippo / Time Out - Felicity helps a mashup creature to realize his true potential. // To avoid a visit to Dr. Lotzashots, Felicity borrows Father Time's watch.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep160

programme.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution - Resilience - Tonga Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - In our last challenge ahead of the finals, our teams are tasked with cooking a soup suitable for the whole family that could be served over a couple of days after a disaster. The judges are after a quick but nourishing soup.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Shelley Wood - Curator, Williamstown Botanic Gardens Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - We step inside Williamstown Botanic Gardens to meet curator Shelley Wood, a remarkable woman who has literally spent a lifetime growing in, and with, this beautiful garden.

programme.title: Four Corners - Traitor Ep21
programme.desc: Australia's greatest untold spy story. We expose how a senior officer at our national spy agency stole and sold highly classified intelligence to Russia's KGB for at least six years.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup Ep1
programme.desc: All eyes on Australia as we co-host the FIFA Women's World Cup. Tracey Holmes brings you the big stories and interviews as 32 teams and thousands of fans descend on our shores for one of the world's major sporting spectacles.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep103
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep123
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep108
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep95
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.desc: More news, more often: the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep83
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Australian Story - The Getting of Wisdom - Hugh van Cuylenburg Ep17
programme.desc: Buried memories and family secrets - how hit podcaster Hugh van Cuylenburg's quest to help people gain a positive mindset took him on his own path of self-discovery and forced him to face some uncomfortable truths.

programme.title: The World Ep123
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: 2023 Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Nestled in the beautiful setting of Portugal’s Algarve, the 100,000 capacity Autodromo Internacional do Algarve – known more colloquially as Portimao, after the port city it sits half an hour outside – was opened on the 2nd of November, 2008. The circuit was inaugurated by WorldSBK when they headed to Portugal for their final round of that season – but it’s not just a racetrack. The Algarve Motorsports Park is a state-of-the-art complex which boasts the stunning race track, a go-kart track, an off-road park, a hotel, an apartment complex, a technology park and a sports complex – it really is the bee’s knees.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2314
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.
